Uses of Interface
gui.Selectable

  • Packages that use Selectable 
    Package Description
    gui  
    saleable  
    team  

    • Uses of Selectable in gui

      Methods in gui that return Selectable 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Selectable ItemSelector.getSelectedObject​()
      Waits for an item to be selected and returns the selected item
      Constructors in gui with parameters of type Selectable 
      Constructor Description
      ItemSelector​(java.lang.String title, Selectable[] items, boolean cancelable)
      Display a panel with radio buttons for player to select on the left side
      ItemSelector​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description, Selectable[] items, boolean cancelable)
      Display a panel with radio buttons for player to select on the left side and display the description of the selection on the right hand side of the panel

    • Uses of Selectable in saleable

      Classes in saleable that implement Selectable 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  HagglingBooster
      Defines a PowerUp object that increases a Hero's haggling stat
      class  HealingItem
      Defines a Saleable object that has the ability to restore health to a Hero.
      class  IllusionBooster
      Defines a PowerUp object that increases a Hero's illusion stat
      class  Map
      Defines a PowerUp object that provides the team with a map
      class  PowerUp
      Provides an interface for a PowerUp.
      class  Saleable
      Provides a superclass to allow the product to be purchased in the game shop

      Classes in team that implement Selectable 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Dandy
      Sets the statistics for the hero Dandy

      Sets the statistics for the hero Explorer

      Defines Hero objects that are used as the protagonists of the game
